#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/enrollmentresponse-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/EnrollmentResponse \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"EnrollmentResponse","id":"cac61b38-0205-42e0-be0a-427c32b2b948","identifier":[{"system":"http://www.BenefitsInc.com/fhir/enrollmentresponse","value":"781234"}],"status":"active","request":{"reference":"http://www.BenefitsInc.com/fhir/eligibility/225476332402"},"outcome":"complete","disposition":"Dependant added to policy.","created":"2014-08-16T08:00:00+08:00","organization":{"reference":"Organization/2"},"requestProvider":{"reference":"Organization/1"},"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:15.944+08:00"}}'
